narrative:
This was prelicense #1
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
Applicant wants to be licensed as a Class "C" Exhibitor.
Husbandry and record-keeping requirements were discussed with the applicant.
Applicant will forward license to Regional Office.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
